transcribe.translation[0].definitions[0]: to write down something exactly as it was said
A secretary transcribed the witnessesâ€™ statements.
transcribe.translation[0].definitions[1]: to write an exact copy of something
He had been asked to transcribe an ancient manuscript.
transcribe.translation[0].definitions[2]: to represent speech sounds with phonetic symbols
transcribe.translation[0].definitions[3]: to change a piece of writing into the alphabet of another language
The book has been transcribed into braille.
transcribe.translation[0].definitions[4]: to arrange a piece of music for a different instrument or voice
transcribe.translation[0].definitions[5]: to copy recorded music, speech etc from one system to another, for example from tape to CD
